original_title: Sri Lanka revolving restaurant to open in time for holiday season
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Citrus Leisure Plc has said it will open its revolving restaurant at the Lotus Tower in a week or so.

“We wish to inform you that the Banquet Hall on the 26th floor and the Revolving Restaurant on the 27th floor of the Lotus Tower Colombo, are expected to be opened on or around December 9,” Citrus Leisure Plc said in a corporate disclosure on the Colombo Stock Exchange.

“Get ready for a culinary revolution! Blue Orbit by Citrus, Sri Lanka’s first revolving restaurant and the tallest in South Asia, is set to elevate your dining experience to new heights!” the company said on its social media.
The company announced on May 31 this year that it had signed a management agreement with the Colombo Lotus Tower Management Company (Private) Limited. (Colombo/Dec4/2023)
